issue.title: Erratic vehicle behavior when breaks are applied and when accelerating

content.raw: The plane being tested on is identical to the ground_plane model except the dimensions have been increased to 500x500. That plane is covered by the default road model with a width of 500 and running from -250 to 250. None of the coefficients of friction have been changed.
content.html: The plane being tested on is identical to the ground_plane model except the dimensions have been increased to 500x500. That plane is covered by the default road model with a width of 500 and running from -250 to 250. None of the coefficients of friction have been changed.
